text: Somewhat underappreciated soundtrack, mainly because the version we got on the GBA didn't have the sound chip to give this original justice. Oh well.
author: Bean1227

text: In my mind, MM&B had a rather unremarkable soundtrack. The only one that I'd say was less memorable was MM8. I was more of a fan of Magic Man's theme in this game, which was very upbeat, and the boss theme is also very good.
author: David E.

text: David E.  I feel the same way about this one overall. The exception in MM&B for me was the Museum Stage, one of my all-time favorite tracks in general.

author: Medal Melodies

text: I love this one, it's probably my favorite robot theme in the game. You just have to love the SNES sound. I can't help but be reminded of the Final Fantasy Prelude theme whenever I hear arpeggios like that and I'm sure I'm not the only one. The game itself is great as well!
